title: Interactive medical/AI informational site on echocardiogram-based heart disease classification with Sonu & Kuldeep branding

file_operations.description: Replace the Rose Day bloom/notes/reveal flow with a single-page informational layout containing clearly labeled sections (e.g., Overview, Problem, Dataset, Method/Pipeline, Model, Results, Limitations, FAQ, Credits) and visible credits for ‚ÄúMUHAMMAD RAOOF‚Äù and ‚ÄúMUHAMMAD MAHTAB‚Äù. Remove the Rose Day love-notes interaction component so it is no longer part of the app experience.
Remove the Rose Day final-reveal dialog component so it is no longer part of the app experience.

requirements.summary: Implement a coherent professional medical/AI theme (colors, typography, layout) and remove romantic/rose styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The design is visually consistent across all sections (matching spacing, typography scale, and component styling).
The theme avoids the existing romantic/rose styling and backgrounds (no petal/rose visuals).
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Replace the current rose-themed palette, typography, and background image usage with a medical/AI theme (clean neutrals, clinical blues/teals, consistent typography scale). Remove any references to rose/petals backgrounds and romantic gradients; ensure global focus styles and section spacing tokens support a professional layout.

Update Tailwind theme extensions to align with the new medical/AI design tokens (colors, shadows, radii, animations) and remove/rename rose-specific tokens/animations where they drive romantic styling.

Apply the new theme consistently across the page layout (section backgrounds, buttons/links, cards, interactive states) and remove any rose-specific classes (e.g., text-gradient-rose, gradient-rose, text-love) from the new UI.

requirements.summary: Add sticky top navigation with smooth-scroll and at least two accessible interactive content patterns.
acceptanceCriteria: A sticky header/nav is present and links scroll to corresponding sections on the page.
At least two distinct interactive UI patterns are implemented and usable on both mobile and desktop.
Interactive elements are keyboard operable (Tab focusable; Enter/Space activates where applicable).

file_operations.description: Create a sticky header with top navigation links that smooth-scroll to in-page sections and includes accessible keyboard support (visible focus, Enter/Space activation where applicable). Include the Sonu & Kuldeep logo placement in the header. Use the shadcn-ui component library where appropriate (e.g., Button, Navigation/Menu primitives) to standardize interactive styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement an interactive Tabs pattern for content such as ‚ÄúPipeline / Model / Results‚Äù (or equivalent), ensuring keyboard navigation and ARIA semantics. Prefer shadcn-ui Tabs primitives for accessibility and consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement an interactive Accordion FAQ section (expand/collapse questions) with full keyboard operability and visible focus states. Prefer shadcn-ui Accordion primitives for accessibility and consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the sticky header and the two interactive patterns (Tabs + Accordion) into the page and ensure section anchors/ids align with the nav smooth-scroll behavior.

requirements.summary: Integrate a unique Sonu & Kuldeep logo in the header and use it as the favicon/app icon.
acceptanceCriteria: A custom logo image is present in the header.
The browser tab/favicon uses the same brand mark.
The logo includes the names ‚ÄúSonu‚Äù and ‚ÄúKuldeep‚Äù as part of the visual mark (not just plain body text elsewhere).

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sonu-kuldeep-logo.dim_512x512.png and ensure it is the primary brand mark used in the UI.
Add the generated favicon/app icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/sonu-kuldeep-favicon.dim_128x128.png for browser tab usage.

Render the logo image (frontend/public/assets/generated/sonu-kuldeep-logo.dim_512x512.png) in the header with appropriate alt text and sizing; ensure the logo mark includes ‚ÄúSonu‚Äù and ‚ÄúKuldeep‚Äù visually (as provided by the asset).
Add/adjust favicon metadata to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/sonu-kuldeep-favicon.dim_128x128.png and ensure it is used by the browser tab.

requirements.summary: Update document metadata and visible branding to remove Rose Day naming and match the new topic/brand.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML <title> no longer references the Rose Day greeting page and reflects the new topic/brand.
Visible header branding matches the new logo/owners and topic context.

file_operations.description: Update the HTML title to reflect the new site topic/brand (medical/AI echocardiogram classification) and remove all Rose Day references.
Ensure visible header branding (logo + site name/tagline) matches the new topic context and owners (Sonu & Kuldeep), with English UI text.
Ensure the hero/primary heading and above-the-fold branding align with the updated title and logo/owners, with no Rose Day references.

requirements.summary: Add and reference newly generated static images from frontend/public/assets/generated and stop using old rose/petals assets.
acceptanceCriteria: All new images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced via static paths.
The old rose/petals generated images are not used as the page background or hero imagery.
No backend endpoints are introduced for image delivery.

Add the generated subtle background texture at frontend/public/assets/generated/medical-bg-texture.dim_1920x1080.png.
Add the generated pipeline icon set at frontend/public/assets/generated/pipeline-icons-set.dim_384x128.png (data/model/results icons).

requirements.summary: Ensure the site is responsive and accessible with readable contrast, sensible spacing, and clear focus states.
acceptanceCriteria: All sections render without overflow issues on small screens.
Text contrast is readable for primary content and navigation.
All interactive controls have visible focus styling and are usable by keyboard.

file_operations.description: Add/adjust global focus-visible styles and contrast-safe defaults for links/buttons/interactive controls; ensure typography and spacing scale responsively and that focus rings are clearly visible on the new medical/AI theme.

Ensure responsive layout for all sections (mobile-first spacing, no horizontal overflow), provide skip-to-content link if needed, and confirm interactive elements (nav links, tabs, accordion triggers) are reachable and operable via keyboard.
Ensure the sticky header remains usable on small screens (responsive nav behavior) and that keyboard focus order and visible focus states are clear across navigation controls.
